sentences.sContent: The court acquitted Campbell on the grounds of temporary insanity.
sentences.sCn: 法庭以坎贝尔一时精神错乱为由判他无罪释放。

synos.tran: 疯狂；精神错乱；[内科]精神病；愚顽

remMethod.val: 来自insane(a. 精神失常的， 疯狂的)； in(不) + san(健全的) + e → 精神不健全的 → 精神失常的

words.tran: 疯狂的；精神病的；极愚蠢的
疯狂地；狂暴地；精神错乱地

trans.tranOther: the state of being seriously mentally ill, so that you cannot live normally in society
